name: Michel Abdalla
content: Michel Abdalla's HomePage Home || Publications || CryptoBib Michel Abdalla, Ph.D. Senior Research Scientist at Nexus Crypto Team (on leave) Computer Science Department École Normale Supérieure 45 Rue d'Ulm, 75230 Paris Cedex 05 - France Email: Michel Abdalla at ens fr Welcome to Michel Abdalla's Homepage! I graduated from the crypto group at the Computer Science Department at UCSD in the Fall of 2001, where I used to work under the supervision of Prof. Mihir Bellare. Before going to UCSD, I worked in the networking area at the Computer Network Research Group at Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (GTA/UFRJ). Since November 2005, I am a CNRS full-time researcher at the Computer Science Department at the École Normale Supérieure, Paris. Home || Publications || CryptoBib Last Updated: January 2, 2018
